title: UTF-8Greek and Coptic

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8Greek and Coptic with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Hex 0370-03FF / Decimal 880-1023 If you want any of these characters displayed in HTML, you can use the HTML entity found in the table below. If the character does not have an HTML entity, you can use the decimal (dec) or hexadecimal (hex) reference. Example

summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8Greek and Coptic concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8Greek and Coptic effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8Greek and Coptic and how to apply it in your projects.
